transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good evening sir, Smriti baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, pehle aap se connect ki thi na?
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Ha ji sir. Hello. Ji bataiye. Basically sir, ha aawaz aa rahi hai na aapko? Ji sir, isme sir hum basically discuss karna tha ki aapne jo kuch aise product add kiye hue hai sir, jisme aapne na category ko sir negative mark kar rakha hai. Wedding gift ke sath aap deal karte ho na sir wedding gift?
Customer: Ji ha.
Executive: Ha ji sir, isme aapka product added nahi hai sir, to ise hume add karna hai aur Pooja thali bhi is tarah se aapka out of stock yaha pe dikha raha hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai. Pooja thali mein koi ek do specific dikha raha hounga, sab nahi dikha raha hounga.
Usme kaafi design pade hue hai, kaafi design hai usme, do ek design kuch dikha raha hounga, baaki jo remove kare hounga, woh show kar raha hounga woh.
Executive: Accha aur sir ye dry fruit tray hai sir, sir dry fruit tray bhi aapki category aapne jo rakhi hai sir, ye iske sath aap deal nahi karte kya? Isko aapne negative mark kar rakha hai?
Customer: Negative mark kar rakha hai humne?
Executive: Ha ji sir. Aapne ise negative mark kar rakha hai, iske sath aap deal nahi karte dry fruit tray ke sath?
Customer: Dry fruit tray, ha dry fruit tray mein deal nahi kar rahe, dry fruit basket mein deal kar rahe hai, tray mein deal nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Ha bilkul. Dry fruit tray mein deal nahi kar rahe, thik hai. Flower pot mein deal karte hai sir aap?
Customer: Ji ha.
Executive: Flower pot mein deal karte hai, isko bhi aapne negative mark kar rakha hai sir.
Customer: Usme metal flower pot, agar khali flower pot hum add karte hai na, to resin ke, glass ke sab aate hai, metal flower pot add ho, add hai metal flower pot.
Executive: Accha, thik hai to flower pot ke sath aap deal nahi karte ho, right sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi, flower pot mein deal karte hai lekin metal ke flower pot. Kai baar kya hota hai, jaise hamare product hai, usme na resin ki, glass ki, paper ki sab tarah ki inquiries mix ho jati hai usme. Jaise abhi hum khali wedding gift dal rahe hai, to wedding gift mein na sab tarah ke wedding gift aayenge. Hamara jo product hai na, woh hai metal ka. To hum usme basically yahi add karke chalte hai ki metal wedding gift, metal ya brass gift item is type se, nahi to na bahut jyada last time ho gaya tha, usme aapko jaise samajh lijiye joot ki resin ki aur aapki clay ki is type ki sabki inquiry mix honi shuru ho gayi thi woh.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To sabse badi samasya hamare sath ye rehti hai Himanshu ji se bhi last time hamara bhi discussion chal raha tha, woh yahi samasya aa rahi thi humko ki hamari jo wiper ke lead hai na, woh wiper ke hoke na alag categories mein chali ja rahi thi woh.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Ha to hamara basically jo product metal ka hai, to hume ye rehta hai ki bhai jo hamare paas lead aaye woh metal ki aaye, agar gift item mein aa raha hai to metal ka gift item ya brass ka gift item, statue aaye to metal ki ya brass ki is type ka rehta hai.
Executive: Accha, metal ki aaye ya glass ki aaye, right sir?
Customer: Brass, brass, brass.
Executive: Brass ki, to brass mein sir. Ha brass nahi.
Executive: Accha brass. Brass utensil mein use nahi karte. Na na, utensil mein brass utensil mein use nahi karte.
Executive: Thik hai. To flower. Aap na ek baar hamare product pe, aap hamare ek baar product dekhenge thoda sa, usko aap dekhenge to ek aapko usme idea mil jayega ki hamare product kya hai. To basically kya hota hai ki jaise shuru mein humne khali marriage gift hi dala hua tha, to mam usme kya ho raha tha ki marriage gift se na kapde ki bhi, iron ki bhi, electric ki bhi kai tarah ki inquiry mix match hoke aa rahi thi woh. Aur hamara jo product hai woh hai metal ka, usme hum brass, iron, aluminium, steel is type ke product ke hum gift item banate hai. To hum ye chahte hai ki jo hamari lead hai, woh inhi concerns se aaye, unhi metal ke ki aaye, ye nahi ho ki alag alag tarike ki aani shuru ho jaye.
Executive: Accha, thik hai. Thik hai sir to isme. To isme na aap hamari na, ek baar aap hamari na thodi si catalog dekhiyega usme se ki kya product hai, to usse ekdam se aapko na samajh mein aa jayega kya hai. Accha aur dry fruit tray hai sir aapka aur flower pot, aap bata rahe the kaun kaun sa negative category aapne mark kar rakha hai? Ek maine aapko bataya sir dry fruit tray ka, dusra bataya tha aapka flower pot ka.
Customer: Flower vase mein, flower vase hai hamara, main aap dekhiye aapke yaha kam se kam hamare 20 flower vase pade hue hai lekin woh metal flower pot hai, woh pada hua hai apna, woh minus kiya hua hai, ye nahi pata mujhe lekin woh metal flower pot hai hamara.
Executive: Isliye aapne isko negative mark kar rakha tha kyuki aapko metal flower pot se bhi flower pot mein aapko generic bahut saari leads aati hogi, right sir?
Customer: Ha, flower vase mein na resin ka jyada aata hai mam usme, resin ka aana shuru ho jata hai, resin ka aur glass ka aana shuru ho jata hai woh usme.
Executive: Ji sir, isme ye to chalo thik hai sir, iske alawa sir agar main baat karu to isme metal gift box sir aapka out of stock hai sir.
Customer: Kuch product aise hai, abhi humne jo pichle do teen mahine mein naye product add kare hai aur kuch product deactivate kare hue hai. To woh aapke yaha jo deactivate product hai woh shayad out of stock show karte hai.
Executive: Hai mam?
Executive: Accha. Ji sir. Ji main ye jaha tak jankari hai ki hum jo kuch product apne deactivate karte hai, aapke platform pe woh out of stock nazar aata hai woh.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai sir. To isme se woh. Ha ji bataiye, bataiye sir.
Executive: Ha ji sir, to isme hum dekho sir kal to obviously hum connect honge Google Meet pe, baaki sir abhi mere end se to abhi isme flower pot ko negative usko main samajh rahi ki aapne kyu mark kar rakha hai aur dry fruit tray ko, thik hai sir. Iske alawa sir aapne jo negative ek to mark kar rakha tha woh hai Kerala ka home decor ko, to iska kya hai sir?
Customer: Metal home decor product hamare paas rehte hai, khali home decor se jo hai woh bhi bifurcate ho rahi thi lead hamari. To hamara last time inhone kaafi product mein brass gift item, metal gift item is type se add karaya tha jisse ki hamara metal ki lead aaye.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To jo hamara jo hai concern woh ye tha ki baar baar hamara yahi bigad jata hai ki metal ki bajaye dusri taraf chale aate hai, fir woh use correction hota, fir aata, fir woh aisa ho jata baar baar, ye samasya aa rahi hai humko lagatar.
Executive: Samajh gayi sir, samajh gayi, samajh gayi sir, samajh gayi. To abhi sir abhi na is month mein na aapko like overall jo inquiries aayi hai last 30 days mein agar main last 30 days mein sir aapki inquiries sir 279 aayi hai aur aapka call response rate sir 75% ka tha aapka.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Ji sir, to abhi sir hum isko catalog services pe hum work karna hoga, catalogs hum dheere dheere order boost karenge sir aur jo bhi main samajh gayi aapne negative category kyu mark kar rakha hai sir.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Aur main kal kitne baje tak aapki team se rahi sir?
Customer: Mam aapko na aap thoda apna time ek bata dijiye kya aapko suit karega, main na bete ko aapka number dunga, Vaibhav Aggarwal hai aapko bhi main message kar deta hu kaun se number pe karna hai aap bata dijiye. To aapko jaise suitable hoga uske hisab se woh kar lega, thik hai na?
Executive: Okay sir. Kyuki woh yaha pe nahi hai, bahar hai woh.
Executive: Accha thik hai, thik hai sir, thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai to woh handle jo hai ye saari cheeze na wohi dekhega, to aap bataiye main kis number pe uska number aapko bhej du aur aapka ek number hai kaun sa number main aapka us bete ko bhej du?
Executive: Sir main aapko WhatsApp kar deti hu sir.
Customer: Ji thik hai mam ji, thank you mam, okay.
Executive: Thank you sir aur sir main is call ke baad na.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's products are marked as negative category.

- Pooja thali showing out of stock.

- Wants metal leads, not other materials.

- Metal gift box is out of stock.



Resolution:

- Executive understood why categories marked negative.

- Executive will connect on Google Meet.

- Executive will work on catalog services.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share customer's number with Vaibhav Aggarwal.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- negative marking, product category, metal leads, catalog
